column2: "\"Nagrus\" detected at the mountain summit. Population unknown."
"Keep monitoring it. Oranje, keep an eye on the forest."
"...I've read your training results and have no complaints. As such..."
"Next, I'd like you all to show me your abilities in a real scenario."
"Just now, a large number of DOLLS have been detected nearby at Mount Magnus."
"I would have you clear them out."
"Of course, I'm not asking you three to go alone. I'll be assigning plenty of ARKS to serve as your support."
"Right out of training and into live combat, I see."
"You all have more than what it takes. I believe that. So what do you say? Will you do it?"
"Experience is the best teacher, right? Alright, we'll give it a shot."
"After you've made your preparations, I'd like you to make your way to the foot of Mount Magnus."
"There, you can meet up with the support I've assigned to you."
